name: Color (itch) (Mixed Palette)
description:
My friend compared me to a chameleon once because I'd always change for others.

If that's the case... who does that make me?

Color is a visual novel about a girl named Cammil, name changeable, trying to better understand herself. Except she's been walking for a very long time, and she still doesn't understand.

Maybe a little push will help her out.

Color features:

  • Around 10k words of dialogue!
  • 4 endings!
  • Finding yourself!

Color was made for a school project, and is currently complete. It is, however, still pending to receive updates as we are having someone make the music.

Team:

  • Kikochii: Coder, edited the script and did lineart for the human sprites.
  • Pangea: Designed the gui, logo, and did Vox's sprites.
  • Sen: Backgrounds.
  • Xandria: Writer and colorist for the human sprites. Also made Sen do like 24 backgrounds
